categories.name: Redeeming Smart
categories.description: Getting maximum value from your points

hacks.title: The Grocery Store Gold Mine
hacks.summary: Earn 4X-6X points on everyday purchases through grocery store gift card stacking
detailed_steps: Get a credit card with bonus category for grocery stores (e.g., Amex Gold 4X, Chase Freedom quarterly 5X)
Buy gift cards at grocery stores for stores you already shop at (Amazon, Target, gas stations)
Stack with store loyalty programs and cashback portals
Use gift cards for normal purchases
Net result: 4X-6X on purchases that would normally earn 1X
requirements: Credit card with grocery bonus category
Grocery stores that sell gift cards
Self-control to only buy gift cards you'll actually use
warnings: Don't buy more gift cards than you can use
Some cards exclude gift cards from bonus categories - check T&Cs
Don't manufacture spending on cards you don't plan to keep

hacks.title: Virgin Atlantic ANA Redemption Sweet Spot
hacks.summary: Book ANA First Class to Japan for 110K Virgin points instead of 165K through ANA direct
detailed_steps: Accumulate transferable points (Amex MR, Chase UR, Citi ThankYou)
Wait for transfer bonuses (Amex regularly offers 25-40% bonuses to Virgin Atlantic)
Search ANA award space 330 days in advance (opens at midnight Japan time)
Call Virgin Atlantic to book over the phone (online booking often doesn't work)
Pay minimal taxes (typically $80-150)
Enjoy one of the world's best First Class products for a fraction of the cost
warnings: ANA space is competitive - book exactly 330 days out
Virgin phone agents can be inconsistent - HUCA if needed
Award space to/from Tokyo better than to/from other Japanese cities

hacks.title: The Self-Referral Strategy
hacks.summary: Refer yourself for multiple credit cards using Player 2, earning referral bonuses + SUBs
detailed_steps: Have a trusted Player 2 (spouse, partner, family member)
Get a card with good referral bonuses (e.g., Chase Sapphire cards give 15K-20K per referral)
Generate your referral link
Player 2 applies using your referral link
You earn referral bonus, Player 2 earns welcome bonus
After 3-6 months, reverse: Player 2 refers you for their next card
Rinse and repeat with different card families
requirements: Both players eligible for cards (under 5/24, etc.)
warnings: Stay under issuer velocity rules (5/24 for Chase, 2/90 for Amex, etc.)
Don't refer from business to personal or vice versa with same SSN
Space out applications 2-3 months apart
Banks may claw back bonuses if abuse detected

hacks.title: Southwest Companion Pass - The Family Hack
hacks.summary: Earn Companion Pass through credit card bonuses, get a companion for free on all Southwest flights for up to 2 years
detailed_steps: Wait until January or February to start (maximizes CP duration)
Apply for 2 Southwest credit cards (Personal + Business)
Meet minimum spend requirements
Earn 125,000+ qualifying points from SUBs + spend
Companion Pass activates automatically
Add companion (can change 3x per year)
Companion flies free on all Southwest flights for rest of year + next full year
requirements: Ability to meet minimum spend ($3K-5K per card)
warnings: Only qualifying points count toward CP (not transferred points)
Plan timing carefully - apply in January for maximum 24 months
Companion must be added before booking
Companion pays taxes/fees (~$5.60 per one-way)

hacks.title: Marriott Platinum Status Challenge
hacks.summary: Fast-track to Marriott Platinum Elite with just 16 nights in 3 months
detailed_steps: Call Marriott or email status challenge team
Request Platinum Status Challenge
Get instant Platinum Elite status for 90 days
Complete 16 qualifying nights within 90 days
Status extended through end of next calendar year
Earn suite upgrades, lounge access, free breakfast
requirements: Ability to stay 16 nights in 3 months
warnings: Challenge not always available - call to confirm
16 nights must be paid or award stays (not points advance)
Can't do status challenge again for 12 months if you fail
Some hotels charge resort fees even for elite members

hacks.title: Plastiq Bill Pay Strategy
hacks.summary: Pay rent, mortgage, or other bills with credit cards to hit minimum spends and earn points
detailed_steps: Create account on Plastiq or similar service
Add your credit card
Set up bill payment (rent, mortgage, tuition, etc.)
Pay 2.5-3% fee
Recipient receives check or direct deposit
Earn points on payment + progress toward minimum spend
requirements: Credit card with rewards that offset the fee
Working toward SUB or manufactured spend
warnings: Only worth it for SUBs or high-value cards (>3% return)
Some landlords don't accept Plastiq checks
Card issuers may code as cash advance - check first
Plastiq occasionally restricts certain card combinations

hacks.title: Hidden City Ticketing
hacks.summary: Book flights with connections and get off at the layover city for cheaper fares
detailed_steps: Search for flights where connection city is your actual destination
Book round-trip flight that includes desired city as layover
Get off at layover city, skip final leg
Don't check bags (they'll go to final destination)
Don't do this on return leg (airline will cancel remaining flights)
Use sparingly with different airlines/accounts
requirements: One-way or first leg of round-trip only
Significant price difference to justify risk
warnings: VIOLATES airline terms of service
Frequent flyer account can be shut down
Can't check bags
Can't do on return leg or airline cancels rest
Airlines may ban you if caught repeatedly
Use tools like Skiplagged at your own risk

hacks.title: Chase Ultimate Rewards Portal 1.5X Cash Out
hacks.summary: Get 1.5X value on UR points through Pay Yourself Back instead of transferring to partners
detailed_steps: Have Chase Sapphire Reserve or Preferred card
Accumulate Ultimate Rewards points
Check Pay Yourself Back categories (dining, groceries, gas, etc.)
Redeem points against eligible purchases at 1.25X (Preferred) or 1.5X (Reserve)
Get statement credit automatically
Alternative to transferring to partners when no good redemptions available
requirements: No travel plans or transfer partner sweet spots available
warnings: 1.5X is often WORSE than transfer partner sweet spots (2X+ value)
PYB categories change quarterly
Once redeemed, can't get points back for better redemption
Travel portal at 1.5X might be better for flights/hotels
